General.Name: Grand Ocean Retail Group Ltd
General.Description: Grand Ocean Retail Group Ltd. engages in the department store retail business in China. The company also offers management consulting services. It operates 17 stores in12 cities, including Nanjing, Wuhan, Chongqing, Fuzhou, Suzhou, Quanzhou, Xiantan, Hengyang, Yichang, and Hefei. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 237, Fuxing South Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 106
